title: Sampler, 1816
medium:
Medium: linen, silk, and cotton needlework on linen ground with paper backing
Technique: pattern darning, chain, satin, knot and cross embroidery stitches on plain weave ground
creditline: Bequest of Emily Coe Stowell from the Coe Collection
description: Square darning sampler on a very fine, sheer linen ground. In the center, a bouquet of flowers is tied with a ribbon. There are eight cross-shaped areas displaying darning in imitation of different woven patterns. The work is framed by a fine floral border.

exhibitions.title: Hella Jongerius Selects: Works from the Permanent Collection

tombstone.epitaph:
Sampler, 1816.
1816. Medium: linen, silk, and cotton needlework on linen ground with paper backing
Technique: pattern darning, chain, satin, knot and cross embroidery stitches on plain weave ground. Bequest of Emily Coe Stowell from the Coe Collection. 1970-28-4.
